Summary: Seen object that I cannot explain, but have relative military spotting experience, and am puzzled none the less.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Salem
There was one other sighting in Salem on or around February 15th 2012
divs: Sighting Details I witnessed a coupled of objects that all of a sudden appeared in my vision in a north to northwesterly direction. This occurence lasted about two to three minutes. These objects appeared to be linked by some sort of body between the lights that I witnessed. These same lights at one point did what I would call a wagging motion similar to what a military pilot would do as a salute to fallen hero, but this was not as pronounced as whatr what we normally see. I would really like to find out what I saw a few nights ago, but that might not be possible as our own government doesn't beleive its own people anymore. Please help older veteran if you can??
